thread.title: Michael Keaton’s Hot Son Brought Him To The Grammys
thread.title_full: Michael Keaton’s Hot Son Brought Him To The Grammys

author: Whitney Jefferson
title: Michael Keaton’s Hot Son Brought Him To The Grammys
text:
View this image ›
Alberto E. Rodriguez / Getty Images ID: 10514716 3. And he brought his dad along as his date! View this image ›
Alberto E. Rodriguez / Getty Images ID: 10514713 4. In case you weren’t aware, Sean is responsible for penning a slew of hits — like Jason Derulo’s “Wiggle” and “Talk Dirty.” View this image ›
Warner Music / Via giphy.com ID: 10515068 5. Don’t believe me? Here he is performing both of Derulo’s songs. Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=9PwXB-hh20k . youtube.com ID: 10515160 6. He also wrote Demi Lovato’s excellent song “Heart Attack.” View this image ›
Hollywood Records / Via giphy.com ID: 10515078 7. And tonight, he hammed it up on the red carpet with his dear old dad. View this image ›
Mark Ralston / AFP / Getty Images ID: 10514709 8. Just two mega-talented dudes, bonded by blood. View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images ID: 10515311 9. More family gatherings at award shows, please! View this image ›
ID: 10515455
